thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 4 of 63
thread.title: Mr Stephen Kelly
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Mr Stephen Kelly

author: Mr Stephen Kelly
title: Mr Stephen Kelly
text: Since we changed to Energia we have noticed a significant reduction in our bills especially over the expensive winter months. The Netatmo has also given us much more control so if we are out and about and decide to stay out for longer we can turn off the heating and further reduce our bills. I also find the schedule great especially when you consider you can have a different setup for the weekends whereas you can't on a traditional thermostat. I also believe it helps your BER rating and there is no monthly charge unlike other SMART thermostats
